title: Sleepers + Draft Day Fears, Dad Jokes - Fantasy Football Podcast for 8/24
description:
Fantasy football sleepers for the 2022 season! On today’s fantasy football podcast, we discuss a few players that are sneaky picks late in fantasy football drafts! Plus, Andy, Mike, and Jason reveal their biggest draft day fears and cover the latest NFL News! Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for August 24th, 2022.

The 2022 Ultimate Draft Kit and Draft Analyzer are available NOW

Join the largest fantasy football league! THE MEGALABOWL

Connect with the show:
